'''Cemoc''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The kith present an odd trio, a broad-shouldered elf flanked by a tall aumaua and a wild-haired orlan. Each holds weapons at the ready as the woman steps forward. She bears an improvised flail made from a ball and chain.}}

Cemoc is [Cathŵenna](/cathwenna/)'s ally.
